name: @easynews-plus-plus/core

scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test --workspaces
scripts.build: npm -w packages/api run build && npm -w packages/addon run build
scripts.start:addon: npm run build && npm -w packages/addon start
scripts.start:addon:dev: npm run build && npm -w packages/addon run start:dev
scripts.start:cloudflare-worker:dev: npm run build && npm -w packages/cloudflare-worker run dev
scripts.deploy:cloudflare-worker: npm run build && npm -w packages/cloudflare-worker run deploy
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch --workspaces && git add . && git commit -m 'chore: bump version' && git push --follow-tags
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor --workspaces && git add . && git commit -m 'chore: bump version' && git push --follow-tags
scripts.version:major: npm version major --workspaces && git add . && git commit -m 'chore: bump version' && git push --follow-tags

author: panteLx
description: This addon provides content from Easynews & includes a search catalog. It uses a different auth implementation than other Easynews addons to function as expected on multiple plattforms and has some additional enhancements. Self-Host Guide & more infos: https://github.com/panteLx/easynews-plus-plus-addon
